text: aur jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyaar kiya vah haragiz ye na khyaal karen ki hamane jo unako mohalat va bephikree de rakhee hai vah unake haq mein behatar hai (haaloki) hamane mohallat va bephikree sirph is vajah se dee hai taaki vah aur khoob gunaah kar len aur (aakhir to) unake lie roosava karane vaala azaab hai
